children.name: Welcome to BookMe! This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of how BookMe, the web

application ("the Service"), collects, uses, discloses, and safeguards your personal information. By accessing and using BookMe, you explicitly acknowledge and consent to the practices outlined herein. Please review this Policy carefully to ensure a complete comprehension of how your personal information is managed.
We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Service, including but not limited to:
• Personal Information: This includes, but is not limited to, your full name, email address, phone number, and any other information provided during the creation of your BookMe account.
Personal Information: This includes, but is not limited to, your full name, email address, phone number, and any other information provided during the creation of your BookMe account.
• Booking Information: Information pertinent to the bookings you either make or receive through the Service, encompassing booking specifics, schedules, and financial transaction details.
Booking Information: Information pertinent to the bookings you either make or receive through the Service, encompassing booking specifics, schedules, and financial transaction details.
• Communication: Correspondence, messages, or feedback sent to us or other users through the Service.
Communication: Correspondence, messages, or feedback sent to us or other users through the Service.
• User Content: Content generated or posted on BookMe, such as profile data, availability, and visual media.
User Content: Content generated or posted on BookMe, such as profile data, availability, and visual media.
We may also collect certain information automatically when you use the Service, including:
• Log Data: Data concerning your use of the Service, which may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, and device-related details.
Log Data: Data concerning your use of the Service, which may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, and device-related details.

• Cookies: The utilization of cookies and similar tracking technologies is employed for the analysis of usage patterns, content personalization, and the enhancement of the user experience. You maintain control over the use of cookies through your browser settings.

Cookies: The utilization of cookies and similar tracking technologies is employed for the analysis of usage patterns, content personalization, and the enhancement of the user experience. You maintain control over the use of cookies through your browser settings.
The information collected by BookMe is employed for the following purposes:
• Service Provision and Maintenance: To offer and sustain the Service.
Service Provision and Maintenance: To offer and sustain the Service.
• Facilitation of Bookings and Transactions: To enable bookings and transactions between users.
Facilitation of Bookings and Transactions: To enable bookings and transactions between users.
• Enhancement and Personalization: To enhance and personalize the user experience.
Enhancement and Personalization: To enhance and personalize the user experience.
• Communication: To interact with users, address inquiries, and provide customer support.
Communication: To interact with users, address inquiries, and provide customer support.
• Policy Enforcement: To uphold our Terms of Service and other pertinent policies.
Policy Enforcement: To uphold our Terms of Service and other pertinent policies.
• Notifications: To disseminate updates, promotions, and other information germane to the Service.
Notifications: To disseminate updates, promotions, and other information germane to the Service.
BookMe may share your information with third parties in the following scenarios:
• With Other Users: Information, such as your profile and availability, is shared with other users to facilitate booking transactions.
With Other Users: Information, such as your profile and availability, is shared with other users to facilitate booking transactions.

• Service Providers: Third-party service providers may be engaged to assist with the operation and maintenance of the Service. These providers may have access to your information for the purpose of conducting tasks on our behalf.

Service Providers: Third-party service providers may be engaged to assist with the operation and maintenance of the Service. These providers may have access to your information for the purpose of conducting tasks on our behalf.
• Legal Obligations: Information may be shared when required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal processes.
Legal Obligations: Information may be shared when required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal processes.

Reasonable measures are implemented to safeguard your information. Nonetheless, it is important to note that no method of data transmission over the Internet can be entirely secure. Consequently, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
We respect your data rights, which include:
• Access: You can request to see and correct your data.
Access: You can request to see and correct your data.
• Deletion: Ask us to delete your data when it's no longer needed or you withdraw consent.
Deletion: Ask us to delete your data when it's no longer needed or you withdraw consent.
• Processing Limits: Request limits on how we use your data in certain cases.
Processing Limits: Request limits on how we use your data in certain cases.
• Data Portability: Get your data in a readable format and move it to another service.
Data Portability: Get your data in a readable format and move it to another service.
• Object and Withdraw Consent: You can object to how we use your data, including marketing, and withdraw consent.
Object and Withdraw Consent: You can object to how we use your data, including marketing, and withdraw consent.
This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. In the event of substantial changes, you will be informed through the Service or by other appropriate means.
If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@bookme.social.
Thank you for using BookMe! We appreciate your trust and are dedicated to safeguarding your privacy.
